title: Sid Meiers Civilization III + Crack
description:
Sid Meiers Civilization III is a turn-based strategy computer game by Firaxis Games. Here you enter a world as civilizations are beginning to bloom. Play single player or against your friends and research technologies while you build cities & armies. Conquer your enemies or make allies and race to the pinnacle of civilization with pre-set victory conditions such as total conquest, the most Wonders of the World, win the space race and more!


Minimum System Requirements:
...Pentium 300mhz (AMD OK)
...32MB RAM
...300MB Hard Drive Space



Instructions:

1. Mount & Install.
2. Edit Registry to point to correct virtual drive.
3. Copy .exe into install directory.
4. Seed & Play.

Enjoy!
